name: Dominatrix Simulator: Threshold
description:
Dominatrix Simulator is an immersive FemDom VR submission experience based on the exploits, both online and off, of the game’s creators.
In Dominatrix Simulator: Threshold, players start the game in a Victorian antechamber with two statues before them. After selecting a gender to play as, players may enter the enter the domain of the Goddess. Find yourself an object of curiosity for her to inspect and toy with before you are sent away to Learn the Ropes (next release).
The available content is the introduction to the full game. Future modules will instruct you in how to serve the other Mistresses and Dominas of her house.
Features in this game:
Play as a male or female - voice over and dialogue options change to match the gender being played
Choose how your story will go - interactive dialogue choices based on yes / no answers
‘Perform’ in real life to her commands - best played naked!
